Class FireStation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dicycat.kroy.GameObject

  • public class FireStation
extends Entity
    Friendly building which the user can return to to repair the truck or trigger the minigame to replenish water Edited by Lucy Ivatt - NP STUDIOS

      • update

        public void update()
        Checks if the player is in radius. If this is the case, calls repairTruck when the truck is damaged or calls the minigame if the players water tank is not full. Also checks if the gameTimer is over and if so destroys the firestation Added by Lucy Ivatt - NP STUDIOS
        Overrides:
        update in class Entity
